programmes.name: Galileo

services.name: Open Service
services.description: Free service for positioning, navigation and timing.

services.name: Public Regulated Service (PRS)
services.description: Service for authorized users such as civil protection, customs, and police. Robust and encrypted.

services.name: Search and Rescue Service (SAR)
services.description: Europe's contribution to COSPAS-SARSAT to locate distress beacons.

services.name: Commercial Service
services.description: Complementing Open Service with additional navigation signal and added-value services.

innovations: First GNSS to broadcast authentication data
SAR return link alert unique among GNSS
Commercial service enables new business models in GNSS downstream market

programmes.name: EGNOS
programmes.description: Europe's regional satellite-based augmentation system improving GNSS performance.

RIMS.description: Ranging and Integrity Monitoring Stations measure satellite positions

MCC.description: Mission Control Centres generate correction messages

NLES.description: Navigation Land Earth Stations uplink error corrections to GEO satellites

services.name: Open Service
services.description: For applications where human life is not at stake.

services.name: Safety-of-Life Service
services.description: Critical applications where human life depends on accuracy and integrity.

services.name: EDAS
services.description: Terrestrial data service disseminating EGNOS data in real time.

services.name: Fish stock detection
services.description: Earth observation contributes to modelling fish stocks and detecting fish shoals using data on sea surface temperature, currents, ocean colour, and bathymetry.

services.name: Fishing vessels navigation
services.description: GNSS-enabled navigation devices help fishing vessels navigate safely to fishing zones and equipment.

services.name: Biomass monitoring
services.description: Earth observation and GNSS enable biomass monitoring for understanding CO2 absorption capacity and biomass energy potential.

services.name: Deforestation/degradation monitoring
services.description: Earth observation and GNSS track forest biomass changes to monitor deforestation and degradation.

services.name: Forest inventory monitoring
services.description: Monitoring of timber inventories using optical, radar, and in situ sensors.

services.name: Forest vegetation health monitoring
services.description: Monitoring forest health using optical and radar data, NDVI indices.

services.name: Illegal logging monitoring
services.description: Identification of illegal logging using EO data.

services.name: Environmental impact assessment of infrastructure
services.description: EO supports analysis of the impact of infrastructures on the environment.

services.name: Permitting
services.description: EO supports evaluations before permit delivery.

services.name: Site selection and planning
services.description: EO and GNSS support site selection, mapping, route planning, and accurate GIS database creation.

services.name: Vulnerability analysis
services.description: EO supports risk assessment for natural hazards.

services.name: Construction operations
services.description: EO and GNSS support site monitoring and heavy machinery positioning.

services.name: Post-construction operations
services.description: Monitoring critical infrastructure stability using EO and GNSS.

services.name: Pipeline monitoring
services.description: Monitoring pipelines using EO and GNSS-enabled positioning.

services.name: Data centre
services.description: GNSS as time source for network synchronization.

services.name: Satellite communication (SATCOM)
services.description: GNSS for frequency control in telecom gateways.

services.name: Air quality monitoring in urban environments
services.description: EO supports detection and analysis of urban air pollutants.

services.name: Smart streetlights
services.description: GNSS supports smart streetlight positioning and monitoring.

services.name: Urban planning
services.description: EO supports measuring urban footprints and sprawl for planning.

services.name: Urban modelling, 3D modelling, digital twins
services.description: EO and GNSS support creation of digital twins for cities.

services.name: Surveying and mapping
services.description: EO and GNSS support cadastral and urban mapping.

services.name: Urban greening
services.description: EO and GNSS can be used to monitor vegetation cover, the health of green space vegetation as well as precise definition, positioning and monitoring green space infrastructure.

services.name: Bike-sharing
services.description: Bike-sharing and free-floating systems rely on GNSS to locate bikes.

services.name: Navigation (IVS and PND)
services.description: Turn-by-turn indications to drivers through PNDs and IVS.

services.name: Congestion control
services.description: Satellite road traffic monitoring services collect floating car location data for traffic monitoring.

services.name: Passenger information systems
services.description: GNSS provides real-time location and speed of trains.
